<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Calcifda](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1826)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 40</row>

**Perception** +21; gemsight

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Cyclops](/Languages.aspx?ID=30), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Gem Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +21, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +19, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +5

**Int** +7

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Gemsight** As long as Calcifda holds a gemstone, she can see through the gem with [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) and the effects of [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344). When she uses her _pearlescent pyramid aeon stone_ for this ability, she also knows the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) and [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) value of every creature she sees. Calcifda is blind when she isn't holding a gem in her hand.

**Items**
[_pearlescent pyramid aeon stone_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=407), opal worth 25 gp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +23 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 140

**Immunities**
[paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=30), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374))

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5

Light Sickness Calcifda is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) in bright light.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, burrow 25 feet; earth glide

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 3d6+11 slashing plus coal curse

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 29
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **2nd**
[Augury](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), [Undetectable Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=348)
- **3rd**
[Clairaudience](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94)
- **4th**
[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247), [Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=276)
- **5th**
[Incendiary Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=1102), [Summon Giant](/Spells.aspx?ID=324) (cyclops), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)

**Coal Curse**  ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Wounds dealt by Calcifda's claws stiffen flesh and turn the blood that runs from them into tar. Each time a creature is damaged by Calcifda's claw Strike, it must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save or become permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (slowed 2 on a critical failure) as its flesh stiffens like stone. If a creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points from Calcifda's claw Strike and fails the saving throw against coal curse, it's [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=30) and turned to coal. A creature that spends 8 hours in direct sunlight can attempt a new saving throw to remove the effects of coal curse, even if it has been petrified.

**Earth Glide**   Calcifda can Burrow through any earthen matter, including rock. When she does so, she moves at her full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of her passing.

**Gem Gaze** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Calcifda holds aloft a gem and gazes into the mind of a creature within 30 feet, infusing the creature's thoughts with visions of their body slowly turning to coal. The creature must succeed at a DC 29 Will save or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure).

**Lashing Stone** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Calcifda makes a claw Strike that originates from any stony or tarry surface within 60 feet. A creature that fails its Fortitude save against coal curse from this Strike increases its [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) value by 1 (slowed 2 on a failed save, slowed 3 on a critical failure).

**Steady Spellcasting**   If a reaction would disrupt Calcifda's spellcasting action, she attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

</column>
name: Calcifda
